privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtext: At <bold>Sommeri</bold>, we take the protection of your personal data seriously and are committed to transparency in its use. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and how we ensure its security when you interact with our website and services.
privacyPolicy.firstSubtitleText: We may collect the following types of information:
privacyPolicy.firstSubtitleItem1: <bold>Personal Information:</bold> your name, email address, phone number, and other contact details that you provide during registration or communication with us.
privacyPolicy.firstSubtitleItem2: <bold>Usage Data:</bold> information about your activity on the website, including your IP address, browser type, and pages viewed.
privacyPolicy.firstSubtitleItem3: <bold>Cookies:</bold> files that help us analyze your preferences and improve your experience on the site.
privacyPolicy.secondSubtitleText: We use your data for the following purposes:
privacyPolicy.secondSubtitleItem1: Providing services that meet your needs
privacyPolicy.secondSubtitleItem2: Sending newsletters and communicating about our products or services, with your consent.
privacyPolicy.secondSubtitleItem3: Analyzing user behavior to improve website functionality and content.
privacyPolicy.thirdText: We employ modern technical and organizational security measures to protect your information. All your data is stored on secure servers, and access is restricted to authorized personnel only. We do not share your data with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
privacyPolicy.fourthText: Our website uses cookies to help us analyze visitor behavior and improve functionality. You can configure your browser to block cookies, but this may affect your user experience on the site.
privacyPolicy.fifthText: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. If you wish to opt out of receiving newsletters, you can do so at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in the email or by contacting us directly.
privacyPolicy.sixthText: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or legislation. Any changes will be published on this page, and in the case of significant changes, we will notify you via email.
privacyPolicy.footerText: If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
